name: Lion
description: The lion is a species in the family Felidae; it is a muscular, deep-chested cat with a short, rounded head, a reduced neck and round ears, and a hairy tuft at the end of its tail.

name: Capibara
description: The capybara is a mammal native to South America. It is the largest living rodent in the world. Also called chigüire, chigüiro, or carpincho in Spanish.

name: Capuchin Monkey
description: The capuchin monkeys are New World monkeys of the subfamily Cebinae. They are readily identified as the 'organ grinder' monkey, and have been used in many movies and television shows.
